docs.lead_paragraph: One of the women gave birth to a baby with microcephaly, a defect that has been associated with the Zika virus, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

headline.main: Officials Report 9 New Cases of Zika Virus Among Pregnant Women Tested in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Officials Report 9 New Cases of Zika Virus Among Pregnant Women Tested in U.S.

docs.abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announce nine pregnant women in United States have tested positive for Zika virus; one has given birth to baby with microcephaly and another had abortion after defect was detected in fetus; all nine women had traveled to country where virus is prevalent.
docs.snippet: One of the women gave birth to a baby with microcephaly, a defect that has been associated with the Zika virus, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: Life and disability insurers sometimes set higher rates for women who suffer depression after childbirth, or decline coverage at all.

headline.main: An Insurance Penalty From Postpartum Depression

docs.snippet: Life and disability insurers sometimes set higher rates for women who suffer depression after childbirth, or decline coverage at all.

docs.lead_paragraph: Pregnant women should consider not traveling to the 2016 Olympic Games in Brazil due to the risk of Zika virus infection, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Friday.

headline.main: CDC Cautions Pregnant Women Against Travel to Rio Olympics
headline.print_headline: CDC Cautions Pregnant Women Against Travel to Rio Olympics

docs.snippet: Pregnant women should consider not traveling to the 2016 Olympic Games in Brazil due to the risk of Zika virus infection, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Florida appellate court on Friday ordered the enforcement of a state law that requires women to wait 24 hours before getting an abortion, reversing an injunction imposed last year before it was due to take effect.

headline.main: Court Orders Abortion Waiting Period to Be Enforced in Florida
headline.print_headline: Court Orders Abortion Waiting Period to Be Enforced in Florida

docs.snippet: A Florida appellate court on Friday ordered the enforcement of a state law that requires women to wait 24 hours before getting an abortion, reversing an injunction imposed last year before it was due to take effect.

docs.lead_paragraph: Zika infections have been confirmed in nine pregnant women in the United States, including one who gave birth to a baby with a rare birth defect, health officials said Friday.

headline.main: CDC: Zika Infections Confirmed in 9 Pregnant Women in US
headline.print_headline: CDC: Zika Infections Confirmed in 9 Pregnant Women in US

docs.snippet: Zika infections have been confirmed in nine pregnant women in the United States, including one who gave birth to a baby with a rare birth defect, health officials said Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Abortion opponents hailed an appeals court decision Friday that allows the state to begin enforcing a law requiring women to wait 24 hours before getting an abortion, while a group suing to overturn the law vowed to keep fighting.

headline.main: Florida's 24-Hour Abortion Waiting Period to Take Effect
headline.print_headline: Florida's 24-Hour Abortion Waiting Period to Take Effect

docs.lead_paragraph: Surgeons at the Cleveland Clinic have performed the nation’s first such procedure. The goal: to help women who lack a uterus have babies.

headline.main: First Uterus Transplant in U.S. Bolsters Pregnancy Hopes of Many
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Midwest; Ohio: Uterus Transplant Is First in United States

docs.abstract: Cleveland Clinic announces its surgeons have completed first successful uterus transplant in United States.
docs.snippet: Surgeons at the Cleveland Clinic have performed the nation’s first such procedure. The goal: to help women who lack a uterus have babies.

docs.lead_paragraph: Surgeons in Cleveland say they have performed the nation's first uterus transplant, a new frontier that aims to give women who lack wombs a chance at pregnancy.

headline.main: Cleveland Surgeons Perform Nation's First Uterus Transplant
headline.print_headline: Cleveland Surgeons Perform Nation's First Uterus Transplant

docs.snippet: Surgeons in Cleveland say they have performed the nation's first uterus transplant, a new frontier that aims to give women who lack wombs a chance at pregnancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: Global health officials are racing to better understand the Zika virus behind a major outbreak that began in Brazil last year and has since spread to many countries in the Americas.
